Name: Thialy
description:
Thialy is a young man living in a much-populated area of Haiti. He studied agricultural techniques. Recently he offered his service as an agent in the city council.

Thialy would like to develop his entrepreneurial spirit more. He believes he has skills to launch a business. After a training on beekeeping, Thialy wants to purchase two hives to introduce honey into his cookies business in the future. A loan will allow Thialy to start his beekeeping activity.

In the near future, he will use the honey to make bread. That would increase the marketing side of his future business.
